# Module: tf.contrib.slim

Slim is an interface to contrib functions, examples and models.



Defined in [`contrib/slim/__init__.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/slim/__init__.py).
